snippet.title: Blood Bowl 3 | Blood Bowl for Dummies
snippet.description:
Brutal, crazy, tactical… this is BLOOD BOWL! The iconic death sport returns with the new video game of fantasy football faithfully using the latest board game rules and new content.

#BloodBowl3 will release on PC through the Epic Games Store and Steam, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.

For news about BLOOD BOWL 3, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/bloodbowlgame
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/bloodbowlvideogame/
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/BloodBowl_Game
Discord ► https://discord.gg/bloodbowl3
